quotes.quote: A daughter is a bundle of firsts that excite and delight, giggles that come from deep inside and are always contagious, everything wonderful and precious and your love for her knows no bounds.
A daughter is the happy memories of the past, the joyful moments of the present, and the hope and promise of the future.
No matter how many birthdays come and go, you'll always be my little girl.
My daughter is my greatest inspiration.
A daughter is a miracle that never ceases to be miraculousâ€¦full of beauty and forever beautifulâ€¦loving and caring and truly amazing.
Our life's pride and our never-ending happiness is what you are our dear little princess. Happy Birthday.
A daughter is a treasure â€“ and a cause of sleeplessness.
A daughter is one of the most beautiful gifts this world has to give.
If you remember yourself, you will remember me. I am always a part of you. I am your mother.
A mother's treasure is her daughter.
Daughters are like sugar. Too much of them will make the taste of life even better, but too little of them will make life tasteless. You make our life worth living dear daughter. Happy Birthday.
One of the greatest gifts I've ever gotten is my daughter.
A daughter may outgrow your lap, but she will never outgrow your heart.
What I wanted most for my daughter was that she be able to soar confidently in her own sky, whatever that may be.
You are like that dewdrop which rests on a green leaf. You are beautiful like a flower. Calmness generates in the heart of those who see you. Happy Birthday sweet daughter.
Our daughters are the most precious of our treasures, the dearest possessions of our homes and the objects of our most watchful love.
A daughter is the happy memories of the past, the joyful moments of the present, and the hope and promise of the future. Happy Birthday to a wonderful Daughter.
A daughter is a little girl who grows up to be a friend.
The happiest moment of my life was probably when my daughter was born.
Family life brought me a wonderful daughter and that's you. I wish you every happiness on your birthday and forever.
A daughter will follow in her mom's footsteps so make sure to set a good example.
A daughter is like sunshine, who fills your life with brightness and warmth.
A son is a son till he takes a wife, a daughter is a daughter all of your life.
Daughters are angels sent from above to fill our heart with unending love.
A daughter is a day brightener and a heart warmer.
The births of my two daughters were the two greatest moments of my life.

In my life, it would probably be giving birth to my daughter. That probably is the most, the thing that moved me the most, was the most memorable, the most wonderful, the most miraculous. I think a lot of women would probably feel that way, too.
Celebrate the birth of a girl child by planting 5 trees in your village.

At her birthday, my seven-year-old daughter will say that she wants these big cakes and certain expensive toys as presents, and I can’t say no to her. It would just break my heart. But when I was little, for birthdays we just played outside and we were happy if we got any cake.
Anything I've done up till May 27th 1999 was kind of an illusion, existing without living. My daughter, the birth of my daughter, gave me life.

Your birthdays sweep by making a collage of memories of lost teeth, eager smiles and trembling tears—all glued together by time. Now you are 21 and I am exactly twice as old. Yet I feel less than half as wise as I pretended to be on that birthday when you wailed me into motherhood.
The times we spent together on a special intimacy, a quality that I remember best from the day I woke up and my daughter was brought to me in the hospital. I won't top that feeling in my lifetime.

I think of my children's births—carry them around with me—every day of my life... Audrey's thick tuft of black hair that I saw and touched before I even knew the sex of the still unborn person it belonged to. Her hands on her cheeks,... as she shot out. The feeling of a newborn's skin. Eyes wide open.
So I took my daughter in my arms and said, "I love you." I told her that she was precious to me, and I stroked her hair. She sucked her thumb and lay there like a contented cat.

No length of time can make you quit, / Honour and virtue, sense and wit, / Thus you may still be young to me, / While I can better hear than see; / Oh, ne'er may fortune show her spite, / To make me deaf, and mend my sight.
Maiden, when such a soul as thine is born, / The morning-stars their ancient music make.
My daughter's birth was the incomparable gift of seeing the world at quite a different angle than before, and judging it by a standard that would apply far beyond my natural life.

I stood in the  hospital corridor the night after she was born. Through a window I could see all the small, crying infants, and somehow among them slept the one who was mine. I stood there for hours filled with happiness.
I’ve never looked forward to a birthday like I’m looking forward to my new daughter’s birthday, because two days after that is when I can apply for reinstatement.

Baby Girl, you kept your secrets from me! / For in the instant I met you—my wondrous, spirited, enchanting daughter / newly separate from me, you imparted a discovery / which began at your birth, the secrets you always held: / When I was carrying you, you were filling me / with the promise of you, and the extraordinary / baby child woman you would become.
And your breath upon my skin / is a warm wind rubbing earth; / our edges blur and thin. / Girl, to what binds us, / say yes.
So I see it's somebody's birthday / My daughter just turned nineteen / Man O man, they grow up so quick / Party people, we are now going to step back into the wonder world of / Dear Annie.

Well today is your birthday sweetheart and you would have been sweet sixteen / Sure you were our only daughter you were your mom and your daddy's little queen / See we were gonna give you up party and everything but the Lord called you away / To sleep in his beautiful garden so we brought you this pretty bouquet.
